title: Currency rates of NBP
content:
KARACHI, Feb 22 (APP): Following are the selling/buying rates of major currencies issued by the National Bank of Pakistan (NBP), here on Thursday.
CURRENCY SELLING BUYING
USD 282.75 276.66
GBP 357.37 349.57
EUR 306.08 300.03
JPY 1.8797 1.8390
SAR 75.49 73.76
AED 76.99 75.31
